Generate Kaplan-Meier plot for survival data

Source: R/vr_kaplan_meier.R
vr_kaplan_meier.Rd

Generate Kaplan-Meier plot for survival data

vr_kaplan_meier(
  data,
  equation = "survival::Surv(time, status) ~ trt",
  title = "",
  abbreviations = NULL,
  variable_definitions = NULL,
  N = NULL,
  N_unit = "patients",
  time_unit = "days",
  data_source = NULL
)

Arguments

data

input data set
equation

The equation for the KM estimate
title

plot title
abbreviations

passed to plot
variable_definitions

passed to plot
N

patients, subjects, etc.
N_unit

unit label for big N (i.e. patients, subjects, etc.)
time_unit

unit label for the x-axis (i.e. minutes, days, weeks, years)
data_source

label for the data source

Value

ggplot object for the KM plot

Examples

library(survival)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
# Load data from the Veteran's Cancer Study
data(veteran)

data <-  veteran %>%
  mutate(trt = as.factor(case_when(
  trt == 1 ~ "standard therapy",
  trt == 2 ~ "test chemotherapy"
  )))

  vr_kaplan_meier(
    data = data,
    data_source = "Veteran's Lung Cancer Study",
    title = paste0(
      "Comparison of survival in male patients having advanced inoperable ",
      "lung cancer under standard therapy vs. test chemotherapy"))

#> Warning: Removed 6 row(s) containing missing values (geom_path).
